chapter.text: You try to pry open a window. ^1500The teacher was right. ^1500You’re able to get one slightly open, but it stops due to the janitor’s work. ^1500Sadly, the created gap isn’t big enough for you to squeeze through, so you try another window. ^1500Same problem with this one. You make your way through the windows until you get to the very last one. ^1500Before you can try the last one, you hear a crash from the first window.
